Sonic has failed. As Eggman adds the finishing touches to the
Ring Sattelite, all of Mobius fears for their lives.
The rings are getting leeched out of the planet.. now nobody can
withstand Eggman's weapons, with no rings..
You've found the Secret Super Levels... however if you look hard
enough, you might even find some more...
There are three zones here, one of which you must find, but you're
a good Sonic Robo Blast player, so I'm quite sure that finding
these levels will be of little problem to you...

Well, now it's onto the Hyper Levels... hidden here is the Hidden
Palace Zone, lost from Sonic 2... but you'll have to look around these
levels to even HOPE to find it.
Again, if you wish to leave, go and do that now.

I hope you enjoyed playing this game.

Now, you've truly finished all levels of Sonic

you can look at scenes from the cutting room
Antoine: I theenk I wiil croon, uh...
Sonic : I think I will hurl.
Robotnik: Now what are you up to?!
Sonic : Hmm... about 3'4, give or take an
Sonic: You've been a big help, Knuckles.
Knux : Huh! I was just around accidently, we've been good
friends for a while, so you can pay me back when ya can.
Tails : Does that mean you'll still be looking for treasures?
Knux : No Sonic! It's a trap!
Metalla: Sonic, there can only be... one.
Dark-Eggman: No more ammo? Lucky pest.
